incident_updates.body:
Cloudflare observed and fixed an issue which potentially impacted multiple users on 1.1.1.1 public resolver,  in all regions. A higher latency than usual would have been observed.

The impact occurred on  2025-08-01, from 14:03 to 19:23 UTC.

The issue is resolved now.

incidents.name: Cloudflare Pages: Compression issues with custom hostnames

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Cloudflare has identified an issue with our Pages feature: Customers under our Free plan using custom hostnames may experience specific pages unexpectedly returning zstd compression mode. Customers experiencing this issue can add a compression rule to enforce brotli or gzip compression to temporarily circumvent the problem. Nevertheless, we are working to mitigate this issue, more updates to follow shortly.
